long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reads out text from OpenAI Whisper API. 

You use your own API Key and select the voice you want to use from the extension popup. Then you just highlight any text you want from the browser, right click it and select "Read this text aloud".
